title: My B-day July 5th anyone wanna play :D Im bronze though :/
body:
So its my birthday and just trying to find some people to play with :D my main is {{champion:77}}

Friend me

replies.body:
Sure iD love to play Katey and Richy  I am so srry lol I was afk  can u resend inv 


I am super excited I WAS NOT EXPECTING SOMEONE FROM RIOT

Happy Birthday! 

When are you free to play? :D
Ill play with you man, happy birthday!
